name: grassium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows a Pokémon to use the Z-move equivalents of its Grass moves.
short_effect: Held: Allows a Pokémon to use the Z-move equivalents of its Grass moves.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Grass-type moves to Z-Moves.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Grass-type moves to Z-Moves.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Grass-type moves to Z-Moves.
